HeroDetails.paragraph: Student science computer. Building software solutions since 2022.

About.heading: About Me
About.paragraph: I'm a junior full-stack web developer and computer science student. I specialize in creating dynamic and user-friendly websites. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end development, I'm passionate about delivering exceptional user experiences. I'm always eager to learn and stay updated with the latest web technologies. I'm excited to collaborate on challenging projects and bring ideas to life. Explore my work and get in touch-I'd!

Skills.heading: Skills
Skills.subheading: These are just some of the technologies that I'm familiar with and continue to explore and enhance constantly.

Projects.heading: Projects
Projects.subheading: Here are some of my projects. I'm always working on something new, so check back often to see what I've been up to!
